main event: A sighting of an unidentified flying object occurred in Marietta, Georgia on September 3, 1952, lasting approximately 1 hour and 30 minutes.
interesting points: The object performed various maneuvers during the sighting., Witnesses estimated the object's size to be very large and described it as round with changes in color from red to white to bluish green., Approximately 25 people confirmed seeing the object, with some observers having prior military experience., The object emitted sparks and was originally believed to be a flying saucer., The observer noted no sound during the sighting despite the high speed and maneuverability of the object.
witness description: civilian witnesses, including former military personnel
